segments.text: Well , this apartment is really a must-see . Will you come with me to look at it this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . And if you rent it , maybe I can help you find a roommate too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! Do you know someone else who is also looking for an apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my friend Steve . I'll introduce you .
segments.speaker: S2
